forum.content:
......突然聽到熟悉的旋律.......
你是否也曾有一首歌
會帶你回到過去
會讓你勾起回憶
不論是否刻骨 但那韻味絕對銘心
不論悲劇喜劇 至少曾經stand by me
.
.

urls.description:
Restored By: CrisMate

100% sound reworked (replace sound with CD-DA" Compact Disc Digital Audio").
urls.title: Ben E. King - Stand By Me (HQ Video Remastered In 1080p)

forum.title: 片段的回憶 完整的歌
